description: This file is a Next.js page component for displaying detailed information about a recipe, including metadata generation, static path generation, rendering of image, ingredients, instructions, and reviews.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Generates static parameters (paths) for dynamic routes based on available recipe IDs.

methods.name: generateMetadata
methods.description: Fetches recipe metadata asynchronously to generate page metadata, providing fallback when recipe isn't found.

methods.name: RecipeDetail
methods.description: Main React component rendering the recipe detail page, including image, metadata, ingredients, instructions, and reviews.
